tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE extraterrestrial_life_forms (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    type STRING,
    origin STRING,
    color STRING
)

CREATE TABLE extraterrestrial_life_forms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    species VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    origin_planet VARCHAR(255),
    discovered_on TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alien_encounters (
    encounter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alien_id INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    encounter_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Alien_Encounters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    alien_species VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Alien_Abductions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    victim_name VARCHAR(255),
    alien_species VARCHAR(255),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE UFO_Sightings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    witness_name VARCHAR(255)
);
